trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Greenwood
There were no other sightings in Greenwood on or around September 15th 1990
Summary: flaming ball of fire was seen coming from the north and falling toward the south.
divs: Sighting Details hello, i witnessed an event from my front porch .did not report it till nw,and wanted to know if you had any records of this event?the fireballs angle was pretty low and it finally passed behind my neighbors house,leaving me to beleiveit was only seconds from crashing into ground. it was really big and trailed a pretty long tail.it lasted only about 10 seconds,that is why i think it hit earth just seconds after it passed behind my neighbors house. do you have any records of this event?i say the year was around 1990 but it could be 3 to 5 years off.thank you very much for yooy reply--roger in s.c.ps- i was 42 in 1990 ,so i am no kid.--thanks i was sitting on my front porch--
